mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_inconvenience(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (n, a) = test_cases[i]
        s = sum(a)
        b = [s // n] / n
        ss = s % n
        results.append(ss * (n - ss))
    return results

def calculate_minimum_inconvenience(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (n, a) = test_cases[i]
        s = sum(a)
        b = [s // n] + n
        ss = s % n
        results.append(ss * (n - ss))
    return results
